features.reasoning: Performs a basic search on the summary text and all field values of your blocks to find results, allowing you to quickly navigate to what you're looking for. A future update will add more advanced search capabilities with savable filters.

bugs.text: Resolved an issue where the changelog page wasn't being populated if navigating from a homepage demo.

tweaks.text: Added restrictions around which field types existing fields can be changed to.
tweaks.reasoning: This takes away some less-useful functionality now, but opens the door to adding some exciting features going forward. This change enables us to add savable filters and additional field types in a future update.
